name: bno-stucco
description: This template provides a minimal setup to get React working in Vite with HMR and some ESLint rules.

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd Server && npm run watch" "cd Client && npm run dev"
scripts.install: cd Server && npm i && cd ../Client && npm i
scripts.render-build: cd Server && npm i && cd ../Client && npm i && npm run build
scripts.lintFiles: concurrently "cd Server && npm run lint" "cd Client && npm run lint"
